title: [Large-scale] Intelligent Virtual Agent (IVA) Utilization Strategies for EFL Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Language Teaching Theories and Foundational Digital Tool Application
context.additional_context: A project-based course exploring effective integration of IVA (Intelligent Virtual Agents) in EFL educational settings for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can apply the core functions of IVA (pronunciation assessment, interactive practice, customized feedback) to EFL instruction
Learners can develop IVA-based instructional designs in smartphone-based VR/simulation environments
Learners can create IVA-based activity evaluation rubrics grounded in ICALL principles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
